targets.expr: sum by(type, direction, instance, family, state) (rate(tor_relay_connections_total{instance=~"$Instance", family=~"$Family", type=~"$Type_conn", direction=~"$Dir_conn", state=~"$State_conn_tot"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(action, state, instance, state) (rate(tor_relay_congestion_control{instance=~"$Instance", state=~"$State_cong", action=~"$Action_cong"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(type, direction, instance, family, state) (rate(tor_relay_connections{family=~"$Family", type=~"$Type_conn", instance=~"$Instance", direction=~"$Dir_conn", state=~"$State_conn"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(action, type, instance) (rate(tor_relay_load_onionskins_total{instance=~"$Instance", action=~"$Action_load", type=~"$Type_load"}[$__rate_interval]))
